sourcesContent:
import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { FaShoppingBasket, FaFileAlt, FaComments } from "react-icons/fa" import Slider from "react-slick" import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css" import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css" const Home = () => { const sliderSettings = { dots: false, arrows: false, infinite: true, speed: 1000, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 4000, fade: true, pauseOnHover: false, } const sliderImages = [ "/images/photo1.JPG", "/images/photo2.JPG", "/images/photo3.JPG", ] return (
{/* Hero with Slider Background */}
{/* Slider Background */}
{sliderImages.map((img, idx) => (
))}
{/* Hero Content */}

Welcome to AgroNeo

Your one-stop platform for agricultural information and market rates

Update Today's Crop Rate
{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

{/* Marketplace */}

Marketplace

Update daily crop rate for the farmers of your location.

View Marketplace →
{/* Government Schemes */}

Government Schemes

Give information about different government schmes to the farmers. Feature coming soon!

Explore Schemes →
{/* Expert Talk */}

Expert Talk

Get advice from agricultural experts on farming techniques and best practices. Feature coming soon!

Coming Soon →
{/* Footer */}

AgroNeo

Empowering farmers with information

© {new Date().getFullYear()} AgroNeo. All rights reserved.

) } export default Home
